arango Class

Defined in: lib/arango.js:77
Module: arango

Creates an arango connection, can be called either with a JSON Object representing the connection or with a connection String.

Constructor

arango

() Arango

Defined in lib/arango.js:77

Returns:

Arango:

Example:

arango.Connection("https://user:pass@hostname:8529/database:collection")
arango.Connection("https://test.com")
arango.Connection({_name:"database",_collection:"collection",_server:{hostname:"test.host"}})

  • Methods

setAsyncMode

(
  • active
  • [fireAndForget
)
Arango

Defined in lib/arango.js:251

Enables/disables the async mode. Every request is enriched with a header telling arangodb to perform the request asnyc.

Parameters:

  • active Boolean
    • true to activate.
  • [fireAndForget Boolean
    • if true fire and forget mode is activated.

Returns:

Arango:
